DOC.brief_title: Closure Uterine Incision Single Double Layer Technique
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To compare short-term long-term effect myometrial thickness woman suture single- double-layer technique closure cesarean uterine incision . The study randomize clinically control study . Design : Follow-up ultra sound randomise control trial . Surgical technique blind investigator . Setting : An obstetric department tertiary referral hospital , 2008-2013 . Participants : Healthy nulliparous schedule elective caesarean section randomly assign closure uterine incision single- double layer technique . Intervention : A modified version Misgav-Ladach surgical technique use . The woman examine abdominal ultra sound discharge maternity ward , vaginal ultra sound hysterosonography minimum five month post partum . Main outcome measure : Thickness remain myometrium correspond former cesarean uterine incision measure ultra sound .
DOC.criteria: Women submit cesarean sectio Exclusion criterion : Former uterine operation myomectomy surgery result enter cavity , fibroid locate cervix cervicalcorporal border , inflammatory bowel disease , SLE , rheumatoid arthritis , IDDM , reoperations inclusion cesarean section three additional single suture hemostasis .
